title: House & Land Sale in Padukka
details:
Property contain four bed room house with land. This house is only seven years old.

Land has been well grown with various variety of Fruits & coconut trees. Property has been fully furnished & it is included into the sales price. House contain four bedrooms and air conditioned. Master bed room has a small balcony overlooking paddy fields. Addition to that, separate rooms & toilet for the servants. Property has been well fenced.

Currently, Padukka area average perch will cost Rs. 110,000/- However, we will open for the price negotiation.

Please contact :-+94 70 382 0171
